title: Parlor Games
overview: Janine is hosting a daytime party. Good friends- good beer and good stories -- some of them even true. But this party suddenly gets very truthful. The small talk stops. Innermost feelings spill out. And sexual longings are revealed for the first time. The result is a parlor game like no other. With Janine playing host to her guests -- and to a sexual fantasy of your own- perhaps. Let the Parlor Games begin
